posts.post_title: t204s needed - Bowerman, Pelty, Dunn, Bates, Coombs, Merkle, Reilly, Kleinon & Tenney
posts.post_content:
lowgrade cards preferred...beaters welcome.  Paying strong prices and have plenty to trade too if anyone wants to go that route.  Thanks much!

Brian

Still looking for these t204s in particular but am open to most commons.  Thanks guys!

Still looking for the cards in the subject line above.  Paying strong prices and open to buying other commons too if anyone has extra t204s lying around.  Thanks much!
